description: VirtualMachinePreferenceSpec is a description of the VirtualMachinePreference or VirtualMachineClusterPreference.

clock.description: ClockPreferences contains various optional defaults for Clock.

preferredClockOffset.description: Exactly one of its members must be set.

timezone.description: Timezone sets the guest clock to the specified timezone. Zone name follows the TZ environment variable format (e.g. 'America/New_York').

utc.description: UTC sets the guest clock to UTC on each boot.

offsetSeconds.description: OffsetSeconds specifies an offset in seconds, relative to UTC. If set, guest changes to the clock will be kept during reboots and not reset.

preferredTimer.description: Represents all available timers in a vmi.

present.description: Enabled set to false makes sure that the machine type or a preset can't add the timer. Defaults to true.

tickPolicy.description: TickPolicy determines what happens when QEMU misses a deadline for injecting a tick to the guest. One of "delay", "catchup", "merge", "discard".

present.description: Enabled set to false makes sure that the machine type or a preset can't add the timer. Defaults to true.
Enabled set to false makes sure that the machine type or a preset can't add the timer. Defaults to true.
Enabled set to false makes sure that the machine type or a preset can't add the timer. Defaults to true.

tickPolicy.description: TickPolicy determines what happens when QEMU misses a deadline for injecting a tick to the guest. One of "delay", "catchup", "discard".

present.description: Enabled set to false makes sure that the machine type or a preset can't add the timer. Defaults to true.

tickPolicy.description: TickPolicy determines what happens when QEMU misses a deadline for injecting a tick to the guest. One of "delay", "catchup".

track.description: Track the guest or the wall clock.

cpu.description: CPUPreferences contains various optional CPU preferences.

preferredCPUTopology.description: PreferredCPUTopology optionally defines the preferred guest visible CPU topology, defaults to PreferSockets.

devices.description: DevicePreferences contains various optional Device preferences.

preferredAutoattachGraphicsDevice.description: PreferredAutoattachGraphicsDevice optionally defines the preferred value of AutoattachGraphicsDevice

preferredAutoattachInputDevice.description: PreferredAutoattachInputDevice optionally defines the preferred value of AutoattachInputDevice

preferredAutoattachMemBalloon.description: PreferredAutoattachMemBalloon optionally defines the preferred value of AutoattachMemBalloon

preferredAutoattachPodInterface.description: PreferredAutoattachPodInterface optionally defines the preferred value of AutoattachPodInterface

preferredAutoattachSerialConsole.description: PreferredAutoattachSerialConsole optionally defines the preferred value of AutoattachSerialConsole

preferredBlockMultiQueue.description: PreferredBlockMultiQueue optionally enables the vhost multiqueue feature for virtio disks.

preferredCdromBus.description: PreferredCdromBus optionally defines the preferred bus for Cdrom Disk devices.

preferredDisableHotplug.description: PreferredDisableHotplug optionally defines the preferred value of DisableHotplug

preferredDiskBlockSize.description: BlockSize provides the option to change the block size presented to the VM for a disk. Only one of its members may be specified.

custom.description: CustomBlockSize represents the desired logical and physical block size for a VM disk.

matchVolume.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

preferredDiskBus.description: PreferredDiskBus optionally defines the preferred bus for Disk Disk devices.

preferredDiskCache.description: PreferredCache optionally defines the DriverCache to be used by Disk devices.

preferredDiskDedicatedIoThread.description: PreferredDedicatedIoThread optionally enables dedicated IO threads for Disk devices.

preferredDiskIO.description: PreferredIo optionally defines the QEMU disk IO mode to be used by Disk devices.

preferredInputBus.description: PreferredInputBus optionally defines the preferred bus for Input devices.

preferredInputType.description: PreferredInputType optionally defines the preferred type for Input devices.

preferredInterfaceModel.description: PreferredInterfaceModel optionally defines the preferred model to be used by Interface devices.

preferredLunBus.description: PreferredLunBus optionally defines the preferred bus for Lun Disk devices.

preferredNetworkInterfaceMultiQueue.description: PreferredNetworkInterfaceMultiQueue optionally enables the vhost multiqueue feature for virtio interfaces.

preferredRng.description: Rng represents the random device passed from host

preferredSoundModel.description: PreferredSoundModel optionally defines the preferred model for Sound devices.

preferredUseVirtioTransitional.description: PreferredUseVirtioTransitional optionally defines the preferred value of UseVirtioTransitional

enabled.description: Enabled determines if a display addapter backed by a vGPU should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

ramFB.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

features.description: FeaturePreferences contains various optional defaults for Features.

preferredAcpi.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.
Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

endOfInterrupt.description: EndOfInterrupt enables the end of interrupt notification in the guest. Defaults to false.

evmcs.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

frequencies.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

ipi.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

reenlightenment.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

relaxed.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

reset.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

runtime.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.
Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

spinlocks.description: Retries indicates the number of retries. Must be a value greater or equal 4096. Defaults to 4096.

synic.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

direct.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

tlbflush.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

vapic.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.
Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

vendorid.description: VendorID sets the hypervisor vendor id, visible to the vmi. String up to twelve characters.

vpindex.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

hidden.description: Hide the KVM hypervisor from standard MSR based discovery. Defaults to false

preferredPvspinlock.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

preferredSmm.description: Represents if a feature is enabled or disabled.

enabled.description: Enabled determines if the feature should be enabled or disabled on the guest. Defaults to true.

firmware.description: FirmwarePreferences contains various optional defaults for Firmware.

preferredUseBiosSerial.description:
PreferredUseBiosSerial optionally transmitts BIOS output over the serial.

Requires PreferredUseBios to be enabled.

preferredUseSecureBoot.description:
PreferredUseSecureBoot optionally enables SecureBoot and the OVMF roms will be swapped for SecureBoot-enabled ones.

Requires PreferredUseEfi and PreferredSmm to be enabled.

machine.description: MachinePreferences contains various optional defaults for Machine.

preferredMachineType.description: PreferredMachineType optionally defines the preferred machine type to use.
